spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout discrepancies. The L-shaped staircase and central hall structure are entirely missing. The bathroom (WC) and utility room adjacencies are incorrectly rendered, resulting in a generic boxy room layout rather than the specific floor plan geometry.

structural_fidelity.notes: While the model correctly removes the roof and uses a dark background, it fails to capture the internal wall configuration of the floor plan. The window seat bump-out on the right wall is completely absent.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen counter placement is generally correct, but the dining room furniture is hallucinated/misplaced relative to the plan, and utility appliances (W/D) are missing from their designated room.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strong adherence to the low-poly, flat-shaded aesthetic with a correct isometric camera. The visual style matches the requirements perfectly, despite structural inaccuracy.

detected_errors.description: Missing L-shaped staircase and specific utility room fixtures.
Wall layout is simplified and does not match the dimensions or adjacency of the 2D plan.
The right-side exterior wall is rendered flat, hallucinating a straight wall where a faceted window seat/bay window exists on the plan.
